long_description: This fun Solar Rover robot kit from 4M lets your young innovator turn an empty soda can into a solar-powered robot that draws on paper! With parts provided and an old soda can (not included), kids can build their own solar rover robot. Kit teaches how sunlight is converted into energy. Recommended for ages 8 and up. No batteries required; Solar Rover runs purely on solar energy.
short_description: This fun Solar Rover robot kit from 4M lets your young innovator turn an empty soda can into a solar-powered robot that draws on paper!
